speech: I am eighteen years old and studying at Singapore Polytechnic

speech: I was playing football at Yuan Ching Secondary School

speech: Your honour that's Y-U-A-N C-H-I-N-G

speech: Now at what time did the game start

speech: In the morning about ten am

speech: One of them is my girlfriend

speech: The other team has about fifteen boys

speech: My team was wearing blue and white Puma jerseys and shorts

speaker: D
speech: The other team just wore their casual clothes

speech: Can you please tell the court during the game what happened

speech: About half-way through I saw three persons surrounding my girlfriend

speech: Where were you when you saw this

speaker: D
speech: I was still in the field playing football

speaker: E
speech: Who were the three persons that were surrounding your girlfriend

speaker: D
speech: They were from the other team but they were just watching the game

speaker: E
speech: Please continue

speaker: E
speech: Then what happen

speaker: D
speech: I heard my girlfriend shouted Kiat Kiat

speaker: D
speech: So I ran to her and told the three of them to go away

speaker: D
speech: Then one of them told me to mind my own business

speaker: D
speech: I told them to not get violent and talk it out

speaker: D
speech: Then one of them slapped me

speech: Witness where was your girlfriend at this time

speaker: D
speech: She is beside me

speaker: D
speech: On my left

speaker: D
speech: Yes

speaker: D
